deployed_protocols.title: DORA AI
deployed_protocols.description: A local, voice-controlled AI assistant that runs offline. Can execute system commands, answer queries, and code in real-time.

deployed_protocols.title: XAU-BOT
deployed_protocols.description: High-frequency algorithmic trading bot for Gold (XAU/USD). Features GUI control (Tkinter) and automated risk management.

deployed_protocols.title: NEXUS OS
deployed_protocols.description: A web-based operating system built with Next.js. Features a window manager, file system, and functional apps within the browser.

offerings.title: E-commerce & Dropshipping
offerings.description: tech flow, landing pages, ad creatives

system_architecture.content: I am not just a student; I am an architect of code. Based in Bishnupur, I merge mathematics with syntax to create intelligent systems.
